title.native: 魔法少女特殊戦あすか

description:
Legends, myths, magic... Humanity has finally had a chance encounter with a world that had been all but forgotten among all its scientific developments. However, this reunion is not a happy one. Monsters invading from the world of the dead render modern weapons useless, leaving the fate of humanity uncertain. But with help from the Otherworld Trade Agreement, mankind gains a possible means of returning from the brink of death in the form of magical girls. These girls finally lead humanity to victory. However, even this victory proves to be no more than the beginning of a new battle.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Torture
tags.description: The act of deliberately inflicting severe pain or suffering upon another individual or oneself as a punishment or with a specific purpose.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Human Pet
tags.description: Features characters in a master-slave relationship where one is the "owner" and the other is a "pet."

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Drugs
tags.description: Prominently features the usage of drugs such as opioids, stimulants, hallucinogens etc.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Sadism
tags.description: Prominently features characters deriving pleasure, especially sexual gratification, from inflicting pain, suffering, or humiliation on others.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Bondage
tags.description: Features BDSM, with or without the use of accessories.

tags.name: Scissoring
tags.description: A form of sexual activity between women in which the genitals are stimulated by being rubbed against one another.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nk12) 

Writer of the script for Guilty Gear Xtra, the Guilty Gear novels and the drama CDs.

[Website](https://www.garnidelia.com) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAYfguaShVaNDU561_jJoOQ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/garnidelia)

__Members:__ female vocalist [MARiA](https://anilist.co/staff/102307/Mai-Mizuhashi) (Mai Mizuhashi), composer [toku](https://anilist.co/staff/160034/Yoshinori-Abe) (Abe Yoshinori)

The duo first collaborated on the song "Color," which was used as the opening theme to the 2010 anime _Freezing_. The name of their unit came from the French phrase "Le Palais Garnier de Maria" (Maria's Opera), and the asteroid Cordelia, which was discovered in 1978, the year of Toku's birth.

In 2014, they made their debut under major record label Defstar Records with the single "ambiguous," which was released on March 5, 2014. Its title track was used as the second opening theme to the 2013 anime _Kill la Kill_.

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nk12) 

Writer of the script for Guilty Gear Xtra, the Guilty Gear novels and the drama CDs.

Tia Lynn Ballard is an American voice actress and ADR director affiliated with Funimation. Some of her notable roles are Zero Two from Darling in the Franxx, Kusano from Sekirei, Rin Ogata in Rideback.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/FeleciaAngelle) | [Website](https://www.feleciaangelle.com/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/FeleciaAngelleVoice)

An American voice actress affiliated with Funimation.
